tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids I am trying to email a complaint about the smell from Walleys landfill and your email is blocked. It worked yesterday. This seems rather odd. The smell is inside my house and my eyes are really sore. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL Absolutely appalling. @ClareDinnisEA #StopTheStink #LandfillStillStinks #WalleysQuarry

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off My family live 3 hours away so I can't go stay with them üòî I hope you're OK, though sadly I suspect you're not given how strong the hydrogen sulfide odour is again tonight xx

@SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @PHE_EoEngland @StaffordshireCC @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg  this is seriously is not an overreaction. I think we have a critical situation in N-u-L and Stoke tonight. We are watching people falling apart and it's scaring me. It is so bad something major must have gone wrong at the site @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

This needs STOPPING at all costs now @BorisJohnson Send @MPGeorgeEustice and @DefraGovUK to lead the @EnvAgency response. They have proved they can‚Äôt be trusted on their own @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/6XgSNJPbcg

Dr. Neil Carman, published a study (2001) that concluded growing children are more vulnerable to hydrogen sulphide because they breathe more rapidly, taking in significantly more pollution than adults. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe over 30 mins at 5 ppb INDOORS.

Evidence from a doctor that children in Newcastle under Lyme are being poisoned. WHO limits exceeded. Yet @EnvAgency are allowing @RedIndustries2 to resume taking waste. Will it take a death like Ella Kissi-Debrah for @PHE_uk to listen? #stopthestink @DrRanj

tweets.text: @AaronBell4NUL What a time to be alive & struggling to breath  @ClareDinnisEA are you willing to let the bodies pile high in Newcastle under Lyme @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk when will you see the growing environment & health issues? You know this is wrong @StinkStopthe #stopthestink
@ClareNicklin @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 What was the result of today‚Äôs site inspection?
@HelenVi00175623 @StinkStopthe @Kimble8313 @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @Cap_it_off We didn't get one, thought we wouldn't need it, do they work, tonight is horrendous.
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids So the capping is not finished, what now? When are you going to punish @RedIndustries2 for poisoning kids!

Back home last night. House is full of landfill gas, think i lost my waters, started contractions again and now I‚Äôm back on delivery suite. I AM 30 WEEKS! Fuming with @RedIndustries2 right now. @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids

Are you asleep @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA cos I‚Äôm awake with toxic fumes engulfing the house. We can‚Äôt breathe! Lovely understanding lady when I just reported it to @EnvAgency. She should have your job.@ClareDinnisEA Newcastle-Under-Lyme needs evacuating

tweets.text: The last time the toxic fumes were this bad the @EnvAgency "forgot" to switch the monitoring equipment on. This time the ics email has stopped working. @EnvAgency Too many coincidences, @BorisJohnson @AaronBell4NUL What the hell is going on at @EnvAgency!

tweets.text: @Samanth33412592 @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off Silverdale this morning, my house full of toxic stench. Disgraceful

So @EventbriteUK you're planning Funtopia in Newcastle under Lyme 19th May. Not sure how much fun its going to be with toxic fug, are you aware of the heaving pile of leaching landfill @StinkStopthe, sorry its late I'm on hold to the @EnvAgencyMids again with a home full of gas! https://t.co/j3d5u47Ufp

The @EnvAgency calculate that Affinity Water are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of about 430 million litres of water per day.

That's almost 10% of the world's total supply of chalk streams degraded for profit.

Let's talk about a clean conscience shall we. https://t.co/J8nQmVNWlv

I don't usually do this sort of thing, but when it is on my local patch it really gets to me!! Scrub & tree removal in May is terrible practice. Please retweet. https://t.co/cYEIymHH0K Two videos showing the area & my concerns. @DevonWildlife @Natures_Voice @EnvAgency @kiergroup https://t.co/U8doUyBP5K

tweets.text: @a_merrydew @maricaoneill @BBCRadioStoke I feel deflated, angry and upset it just seems be getting worse for everyone around here and it no matter what they are saying it's just lip service. It all boils down to money they don't care how much we are suffering.

@fayedavies It got into my home again about 20 mins ago. I feel trapped & hopeless. I'm home alone & crying on my sofa. I feel embarrassed tweeting this but it's not me that should be embarrassed. It's the @EnvAgency, @EnvAgencyMids, and @RedIndustries2 who should hang their heads in shame.
